TopicTitle: Launch towers & ground crew equipment megathread

Articles.Content: Post anything that stays on the ground when the rocket is launched here. Be it an intricate launch tower with elevators or a bus for transporting kerbonauts to the launch site, anything goes.
so Your telling me Your challenge is all about like, Launch Tower With Elevator and a bus for transporting crew to Launch pad

Let's start simple. For my first couple of rockets in my New Horizons series, I decided that stock launch clamps were too big, so I built this:

It's not mechanical and doesn't actually do anything other than stop the rocket from falling over, but it does that while looking fairly good I think. The rings are hollow cargo docking ports from Near Future Construction; they're better than decouplers for this sort of purpose because parts can pass through them and so can engine exhaust.
